content.rendered:
Mantis Vision F6 SMART
The Smart Way for 3D Scanning

Mantis Vision F6 SMART is suitable for a wide variety of uses and applications in:

  • Architecture
  • Engineering
  • Construction
  • Forensics
  • Oil & Gas
  • Automotive
  • Education & Research
  • VR game designers
  • and many more…

contact us

Phone

03 9687 8638

Address

7A Kent St,
Yarraville, VIC 3013
Australia.

Send a Message

    Are you uploading files larger than 5mb?
    Upload Large File

    Do you want a quote based on your STL?
    Instant Quote Calculator


    (Accepted filetypes: pdf,jpg,jpeg,png & gif. Max file size: 5mb)

    Why Mantis Vision F6 SMART

    We take 3D scanning seriously, so we made a product we would like to work with!

    Fast & Robust

    F6 Smart built to operate in tough environment and under difficult light conditions

    Powerful image projection

    F6 Smart 1.3 megapixel RGB camera use to capture high-quality images during scanning and Echo smart algorithm convert those images to a photorealistic mesh texture

    High Accuracy

    Professional – grade measurements: accuracy of up to 0.1 mm (0.004 in) and resolution of up to 0.1 mm (0.004 in)

    Echo Software

    A powerful scanning & 3D data editing tool, suitable for both professionals and the education sector. It’s both easy to use and high-performance software

    Product Features

    F6 SMART System Benefits

    Outstanding Volumetric Scanner for Field Use

    • IR light – enables work in any lighting conditions from complete darkness to daylight
    • Ergonomic rubberized handgrip
    • No scene preparation – geometry is deciphered by the encoding
    • 2 layer modes of operation: static and dynamic
    • Accessibility to hidden places
    • User-friendly – professionals can operate the system after a short training

    Echo Software

    We are proud to introduce MV Echo.

    Mantis Vision’s advanced Echo software offers sophisticated post-processing tools that enhance the quality of the scanned image.  High quality registration is performed using a patented algorithm to repair missed alignments, ensuring accurate end results. Filters eliminate noise in surface mesh models while retaining all necessary data, and the software delivers highly accurate mesh with color texturing for the highest quality output.

    Echo’s user-friendly interface features five operating modes that provide the operator with full control over the scanning process.

    • IR: pattern mode
    • 2D: captures standard digital image
    • 3D: decodes a single frame
    • 3D+: builds the 3D model in real-time while decoding
    • Overview: rotates the 3D scanned object and checks for missing data

    Scans can be exported to a range of 3rd party formats, including point cloud, polygon/mesh formats, and 3D printers.

    About F6 SMART

    Outstanding Volumetric Scanner for Field Use

    The F6 SMART is the market leader 3D handheld scanner for fast scanning of big objects and large areas from short to far ranges. Based on a patent algorithm of innovative encoding F6 SMART provides superb quality of data making it the ultimate device for scanning complex scenes within seconds.

    F6 SMART Features

    The F6 SMART is operated by an advanced and easy-to-use integrated software with high-end features such as:

    Eye Safety

    Class 1, F6 Smart is completely safe for both in/outdoor use.

     

    AR mobile ready

    F6 Smart models are available for AR/VR applications, you can have a virtual 3D model scanned and meshed within minutes.

     

    Accurate

    With an accuracy level of 0.1% out of the whole model, F6 Smart is one of the accurate handheld scanners at medium range.

     

    Target Free

    No need for targets or reference point, change in geometry or texture is enough for high-quality data and registration model

    Robust

    This gentle looking device can work in very hard conditions of lighting and heat

     

    Fast

    F6 Smart frame rate and Echo thrift processing allows fast data decoding and live preview and segment registration.

     

    Lightweight

    Weighting 1kg, F6 smart allows longer time of scanning to a user who should hold the device while scanning and moving around an object.

     

    Light Condition Flexibility

    From a complete darkness to daylight, F6 Smart is ready to work.

    F6 SMART Industries and Applications

    F6 SMART is suitable for a wide variety of uses and applications in:

    Engineering

    Forensics

    Oil and Gas

    Architecture

    Automotive

    VR/AR game designers

    Aviation / Military

    Simulations and Training

    Technical Information

    PC Specifications

    F6 Smart handheld scanner computing takes place completely on the PC side,
    To have a smooth and fluent scanning we are recommending on the following specs:

    • Weight: 1.689 lb – 1.733 lb
    • Operating system: Windows 10 Pro (supports win7/8.1 pro)
    • CPU:i7-6650U 2.2 up to 3.4 GHz, 4 MB cache, 15 W
    • Memory: 16 GB
    • Storage PCI- Express SSD: 128 GB, 256 GB, 512 GB, or 1 TB
    • Display: 12.3 inches (31 cm) 2736×1824 (267ppi) PixelSense display with 3:2 aspect ratio or higher

    Note – computing unit (Laptop) is not part of the F6 Smart package

    Supported File Format

    Echo support exporting various of popular file formats such as:

    • .ply point cloud & ply mesh (colour data & texture)
    • .obj (colour data & texture)
    • .e57 point cloud (colour data)
    • .pts point cloud (colour data)
    • .xyz point cloud (colour data)
    • .stl (colour data & texture)
    Hardware Specifications
    • Accuracy: 0.1% upon scanning distance
    • XY point density: 5 mrad
    • Low noise level: less than 0.5 mm @1 meter
    • Eye safety: Class 1
    • Ambient lighting: From complete darkness to daylight
    • Depth of field: 4.5 – 0.5 m
    • Linear field of view: H x W 510 x 670 mm, closest range
    • Linear field of view: H x W 4585 x 6070 mm, furthest range
    • Angular field of view: H x W 54° x 68°
    • RGB camera resolution: 1.3 MPix
    • Video frame rate: 8 fps
    • Exposure time: 0.04 – 0.005 s
    • Data acquisition speed: 640,000 points/s
    • Dimensions: H x D x W 32 x 12 x 4.5 mm
    • Weight: 1 kg
    • Power consumption: Internal battery
    • Working temperature:  –10° to +50° / 14’ to 122’F

    Other Handheld 3D Scanners

      Read More
    • Artec Space Spider 3D Scanner
      A high-resolution 3D scanner based on blue light technology. It is perfect for capturing small objects or...
      Read More
    • Artec Leo 3D Scanner
      The first 3D scanner to offer onboard automatic processing, Artec Leo is able to provide the most...
      Read More
    • Peel 3D
      Affordable 3D scanning is here! Say hello to Peel 3D Peel 3D is professional-grade...
      Read More
    • Mantis Vision F6 Smart 3D Scanner
      The market leader 3D handheld scanner for fast scanning of big objects and large areas from short...
      Read More
    • Shining EinScan Pro HD 3D Scanner
      Exceptional versatility and powerful optimizations come together for the ultimate high-efficiency and professional level 3D scanning experience.
      Read More
    • Shining EinScan H 3D Scanner
      Built-in colour camera and large field of view, EinScan H provides high-quality 3D data with full colour,...
      Read More
    • Shining EinScan HX 3D Scanner
      High efficiency and reliable results give EinScan HX more application possibilities.
      Read More

    Want To Know More?

    Our team of 3D scanning professionals are just an email or a phone call away.

    contact us

    Phone

    03 9687 8638

    Address

    7A Kent St,
    Yarraville, VIC 3013
    Australia.

    Send a Message
